faqs.question: What Modules Are Covered in Oracle Apps R12 Technical Training?
faqs.answer: Our Oracle Apps R12 Technical Training covers key modules including Business Flows, RICE Components (Reports, Interfaces, Conversions, Extensions), Forms, XML Publisher, BI Publisher, and an introduction to Oracle Database. This comprehensive training equips you with hands-on skills required for Oracle EBS R12 technical roles. A detailed syllabus is provided in our course brochure.

faqs.question: What Is the Course Schedule?
faqs.answer: Live training sessions are held Monday to Saturday, 1 hour per day. This schedule promotes consistent learning and practical implementation in Oracle Apps R12 development tasks.

faqs.question: Are Weekend Batches Available?
faqs.answer: Currently, weekend-only batches are not available. All classes are conducted from Monday through Saturday to ensure steady progress in mastering Oracle EBS R12 technical skills.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Self-Paced Learning?
faqs.answer: Yes, recorded sessions are available for those who prefer self-paced learning. Please note, live Q&A support is not included in the self-paced format for Oracle EBS technical training.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Internship Opportunities?
faqs.answer: Yes, internship opportunities are offered based on mock evaluation performance. Internships involve working on real-time scenarios related to Oracle Apps R12 Technical components.

faqs.question: Can I Download the Training Videos?
faqs.answer: Downloads are not available through the web portal, but you’ll have secure access to all session recordings for 1 year. However, if you’re using our mobile learning app, you can download up to 20 videos to watch offline—ideal for learning without internet access.

faqs.question: Can I Enroll in a Single Module Instead of the Full Course?
faqs.answer: No. The Oracle Apps R12 Technical Training is offered as a complete learning package to ensure all key components of Oracle EBS R12 are covered holistically.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Resume Preparation Support?
faqs.answer: Yes. We help you craft resumes specifically targeting roles in Oracle Apps and Oracle EBS technical domains, focusing on your project experience and RICE skills.

faqs.question: Is a Laptop or Desktop Required for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes. A personal computer is necessary to install and access the Oracle Applications R12 environment for practical hands-on training.

faqs.question: Are There Any Prerequisites for This Training?
faqs.answer: No prior experience is required. This Oracle EBS technical training is beginner-friendly, though basic knowledge of databases or coding is a plus.

faqs.question: Do You Teach from the Basics?
faqs.answer: Yes. We start with the fundamentals of Oracle EBS R12 and progress to advanced topics, making the course suitable for both freshers and professionals looking to upskill in Oracle Applications.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Job Placement Assistance?
faqs.answer: Yes. We offer full job placement support for Oracle Apps R12 Technical roles including mock interviews, interview guidance, and resume tips.

faqs.question: Do You Offer Oracle EBS Certification Support?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide expert support and study materials to prepare you for relevant Oracle EBS R12 technical certifications.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Training Recordings and Study Materials?
faqs.answer: Yes. You’ll get 1-year access to training recordings and receive detailed guides, code samples, and documentation related to Oracle EBS R12 Technical topics.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Interview Questions and Mock Support?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We supply interview questions tailored to Oracle Apps R12 Technical modules and conduct mock interviews to sharpen your skills.

faqs.question: Do You Provide Instance Access for Practice?
faqs.answer: Yes. We provide 4 months of instance access with complete guidance for hands-on development in Oracle EBS R12.

faqs.question: Can I Retake the Course?
faqs.answer: Yes. You may rejoin any upcoming batch of Oracle Apps R12 Technical Training within your 1-year validity at no extra charge.

faqs.question: Will I Get a Course Completion Certificate?
faqs.answer: Yes. Upon completing the course, you’ll receive an official certificate in Oracle Apps R12 Technical Training from Tech Leads IT.

faqs.question: Is Coding Knowledge Required?
faqs.answer: Basic SQL/PLSQL knowledge is helpful, but not required. We cover all technical aspects from the ground up, focusing on Oracle EBS R12.

faqs.question: Is One-on-One Training Available?
faqs.answer: Yes, one-on-one sessions are available upon request for Oracle Apps R12 Technical Training. Pricing for personalized sessions varies.
